column1: GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
There is a possibility of enhancing the prevailing showery condition in south-western part of the
Showers  will  occur  at  times  in  Western,  Sabaragamuwa,  Southern,  Central  and  Northwestern
provinces. Heavy showers above 100mm are likely at some places in Western and Sabaragamuwa
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places
column2: in  Eastern  and  Uva  province  and

column1: Polonnaruwa, Vavuniya and Mullaitivu districts during the evening or night.
General public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
